channel.title: Things you didn't know in game
channel.description:
We made bread, pies, and pizza restore TWICE as much fatigue as they did before, which should make these foods much more worthwhile. We predict enterprising pizza sellers will turn up at the mining sites shortly :-)
I remember people selling food at mining sites but I never knew why... well now I know... 10 years later.

item.title: Things you didn't know in game
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

Wow, I didn’t know that.

Read full topic

item.title: Things you didn't know in game
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

[quote=“Rodgerwilco, post:17, topic:474381”]I always figured that pastries should give more hp since you have to work more to obtain them… collect resources and deal with the multiple stages…[/quote]But it’s easy enough a woman can do it…

Read full topic

item.title: Things you didn't know in game
item.dc:creator: @nacional nacional
item.description:
@nacional wrote:

Chronic24:

I just remember making Anchovie Pizza at the bandit camp in the wild lol.

lol I gotta say I did that too.

[quote=“Dgc2002, post:12, topic:474381”]Yea i don’t remember the food thing either… I remember pre-sleeping bags where you had to walk to a loveing bed. I don’t think they even added any with the update, you just had to find the nearest one.

They added a bunch of stuff and changed it quickly back then. Remember hard and soft rocks? How long did those things last?[/quote]

Maybe this food healing fatigue was only in rs2? I remember when rs2 was in beta it had fatigue.

Rodgerwilco:

Who else WISHED you could make party hats out of chef hats?

Shit I wished I could have had a party hat anyway

Read full topic

item.description:
@Dgc2002 wrote:

Yea i don’t remember the food thing either… I remember pre-sleeping bags where you had to walk to a fucking bed. I don’t think they even added any with the update, you just had to find the nearest one.

They added a bunch of stuff and changed it quickly back then. Remember hard and soft rocks? How long did those things last?

item.title: Things you didn't know in game
item.dc:creator: @RSCShadow RSCShadow
item.description:
@RSCShadow wrote:

[quote=“CodeForFame, post:3, topic:474381”]Wait, why did nobody exploit this, and just eat a bunch of pizza instead of solving captchas?[/quote]There wasn’t a captcha in the first place. Fatigue was originally restored by eating different foods.

Read full topic
